  
BLOCK ELEMENTS TEST

FROM XML:
<xslTutorial>
<COLGROUP>this</COLGROUP><COLGROUP>rocks</COLGROUP>
<COLGROUP>this</COLGROUP>
<COLGROUP>rocks</COLGROUP>
<COLGROUP>this</COLGROUP>
<COLGROUP>rocks</COLGROUP>
<COLGROUP>this</COLGROUP>
<COLGROUP>rocks</COLGROUP>
<SPAN>this</SPAN><COLGROUP>rocks</COLGROUP>
<SPAN>this</SPAN>
<COLGROUP>rocks</COLGROUP>
</xslTutorial>
